citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 pm on
13-Feb-17.
APHIS inspectors made contact with facility representative who was unable to conduct inspection.
Additional Inspectors
Tygart Michael, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
